selected_quotes: Right. Drop everything, read this refreshing and fascinating piece - an actual Patient Director
In case you missed it, a short article
Short BMJ article on what this Patient Director has been up to in his first exciting and challenging year.
Pt director in the NHS, @DavidGilbert43, reflects on his role...Soon having a patient director will be the norm.”
